meanings.definition: A type of ancient wheat with small grains
meanings.sent1: The einkorns were used to make bread in ancient times.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bag of einkorns to try baking with them.
meanings.sent3: The einkorns decided to have a race to see who would be made into flour first.
meanings.sent4: The einkorns stood together like a small army ready for battle against hunger.
meanings.sent5: The einkorns shimmered in the sunlight, looking like tiny jewels in the field.

meanings.definition: The plural form of einkorn, referring to multiple grains of this type
meanings.sent1: She counted the einkorns in the jar to ensure she had enough for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The einkorns were carefully harvested by the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The einkorns giggled amongst themselves, happy to be together in the same jar.
meanings.sent4: The einkorns cascaded out of the bag like a golden waterfall of grains.
meanings.sent5: The einkorns danced in the breeze, creating a mesmerizing sight in the field.
